CustomField.description: Difference between the value of milestone weight % complete of current month and previous month.
CustomField.formula: IF(Milestone_complete_Prior_Month__c = 100, 0, IF(mavenlink__Archived__c = True, null, Milestone_weight_complete__c - Milestone_complete_Prior_Month__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Difference between the value of milestone weight % complete of current month and previous month.
CustomField.label: Delta Milestone weight % complete
